name: ansible-project
description: Node files that support the development of Ansible roles
author: Brian Zalewski <brian@megabyte.space> (https://megabyte.space)

scripts.lint:prettier: prettier "{**/*.yml,files/*.sh}" --list-different || echo 'Run "npm run fix" to automatically fix Prettier formatting errors'

scripts-info.commit: IMPORTANT: Whenever committing code run 'git-cz' or 'npm run commit'
scripts-info.info: Displays descriptions of all the npm tasks
scripts-info.prepare-release: Prepares the repository for a release
scripts-info.test: Runs molecule tests for all the supported operating systems (this is RAM intensive)
scripts-info.test:local: Installs the role on your local machine
scripts-info.test:archlinux: Provisions an Archlinux Desktop VirtualBox VM, installs the role(s), and does not delete the VM after testing
scripts-info.test:centos: Provisions a CentOS Desktop VirtualBox VM, installs the role(s), and does not delete the VM after testing
scripts-info.test:debian: Provisions a Debian Desktop VirtualBox VM, installs the role(s), and does not delete the VM after testing
scripts-info.test:fedora: Provisions a Fedora Desktop VirtualBox VM, installs the role(s), and does not delete the VM after testing
scripts-info.test:macosx: Provisions a Mac OS X VirtualBox VM, installs the role(s), and does not delete the VM after testing
scripts-info.test:ubuntu: Provisions a Ubuntu Desktop VirtualBox VM, installs the role(s), and does not delete the VM after testing
scripts-info.test:windows: Provisions a Windows Desktop VirtualBox VM, installs the role(s), and does not delete the VM after testing
scripts-info.update: Runs .update.sh to automatically update meta files and documentation
scripts-info.version: Used by 'npm run prepare-release' to update the CHANGELOG
